dcterms:creator: S. R. Bowman
G. Angeli
C. Potts
C. D. Manning
dcterms:description: The Stanford Natural Language Inference (SNLI) dataset consists of pairs of sequences with a label representing certain semantic attributes. In this work, the authors ignore these labels and keep all distinct sequences with the 5000 most common words in the dataset, resulting in 500k sequences.
dcterms:title: Stanford Natural Language Inference (SNLI) dataset
